title: Relates to the offense of aggressive driving
summary: Creates the crime of aggressive driving which shall be a misdemeanor; provides that any person who increases the speed of their vehicle while another person tries to pass, shall be guilty of a misdemeanor.

S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         1304

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. GANTT, GABRYSZAK -- read once and referred to the
         Committee on Transportation

       AN  ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the offense
         of aggressive driving

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  The  vehicle  and  traffic law is amended by adding a new
    2  section 1212-a to read as follows:
    3    S 1212-A. AGGRESSIVE DRIVING. A PERSON IS GUILTY OF AGGRESSIVE DRIVING
    4  WHEN:
    5    (A) HE OR SHE RECKLESSLY OPERATES A MOTOR VEHICLE ON A PUBLIC  HIGHWAY
    6  IN  A  MANNER THAT CREATES A SUBSTANTIAL RISK OF SERIOUS PHYSICAL INJURY
    7  TO ANOTHER PERSON; OR
    8    (B) HE OR SHE OPERATES A MOTOR  VEHICLE  ON  A  PUBLIC  HIGHWAY  WHILE
    9  DISPLAYING  A  DEADLY  WEAPON,  DANGEROUS  INSTRUMENT OR WHAT REASONABLY
   10  APPEARS TO BE A PISTOL, REVOLVER, RIFLE, SHOTGUN, MACHINE GUN  OR  OTHER
   11  FIREARM  IN  SUCH A MANNER TO PLACE ANOTHER PERSON IN REASONABLE FEAR OF
   12  DEATH OR SERIOUS PHYSICAL INJURY; OR
   13    (C) HE OR SHE OPERATES A MOTOR VEHICLE ON A PUBLIC HIGHWAY IN  SUCH  A
   14  MANNER  TO  PLACE  ANOTHER PERSON IN REASONABLE FEAR OF DEATH OR SERIOUS
   15  PHYSICAL INJURY.
   16    AGGRESSIVE DRIVING IS A MISDEMEANOR.
   17    S 2. Subdivision (b) of section 1122 of the vehicle and traffic law is
   18  amended to read as follows:
   19    (b) Except when overtaking and passing on the right is permitted,  the
   20  driver  of  an overtaken vehicle shall give way to the right in favor of
   21  the overtaking vehicle [on audible signal] and shall  not  increase  the
   22  speed  of his vehicle until completely passed by the overtaking vehicle.
   23  ANY PERSON DELIBERATELY INCREASING THE SPEED OF HIS OR  HER  VEHICLE  IN
   24  VIOLATION OF THIS SUBDIVISION SHALL BE GUILTY OF A MISDEMEANOR.
   25    S 3. This act shall take effect on the first of November next succeed-
   26  ing the date on which it shall have become a law.

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD03211-01-1
